src:
Tanggapan Deddy Corbuzier Saat Dijadikan Bahan Pesta Halloween
03 Nov 2019, 08:59 by Tempo.co, Istiqomatul Hayati
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Deddy Corbuzier merespons senang unggahan Youtuber, Cindercella, yang meniru gayanya saat masih menjadi magician sepuluh tahun lalu dalam pesta Halloween. Ia mengunggah ulang unggahan video itu di akun Instagramnya pada Minggu, 3 November 2019.
“@cindercella Anda kurang ajar. Pikir gue setan? Tapi kok ya lucu. Gue kaya gitu ya dulu, Damn it’s a cool make up!! Gue dikirimin sekelibar mikir itu gue,” tulis Deddy pada keterangan video tersebut. Di tengah keterangan, Deddy menambahkan emoji tertawa lepas.
Dalam video itu, Cindercella amat cerdas mempresentasikan dandanan dan gaya Deddy Corbuzier saat masih aktif menjadi magician. Penampilannya amat mirip dengan Deddy yang tatanan rambutnya masih bergaya ala Kaisar Ming.
Unggahan dan respons Deddy ini membuat netizen membandingkannya dengan Melly Goeslaw yang merasa upaya makeup artist Bubah Alfian meniru dirinya dalam Pesta Halloween telah mempermalukannya. "Sebuah sikap yang baik ditunjukkan,” ujar Kristo Imanuel, peniru suara puluhan karakter memuji Deddy.
Kekasih Sabrina Chairunnisa sendiri mencoba menjawab bijak tanggapan netizen saat membandingkan dirinya dengan Melly. “Tapi om, artis sebelah dijadiin bahan becanda Halloween malah marang-marah, gimana nih?” celetuh @shendi_ant. Deddy menjawab, “Haknya masing-masing. Kalau saya selama bukan SARA it’s fun.”
Cindercella sendiri menulis komentarnya di kolom unggahan ayah satu anak ini. “Om Deddy ngefans! Makasih ya sudah menginspirasi makeup jaman dulunya.” Deddy balik memuji Youtuber yang kerap membuat konten tutorial makeup itu. “Ini luar biasa, bagaimana kamu melakukannya.”
text:
Deddy Corbuzier's Response When Made a Halloween Party Material
03 Nov 2019, 08:59 by Tempo.co, Istiqomatul Hayati
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Deddy Corbuzier responded happily to Youtuber's upload, Cindercella, who copied his style when he was a magician ten years ago at a Halloween party. He reuploaded the video upload on his Instagram account on Sunday, November 3, 2019.
"You are insolent @cindercella. Think I'm a devil? But how come it's funny. I'm like that first, Damn it's a cool make up !! I was sent all thinking that was me, "Deddy wrote in the description of the video. In the middle of the explanation, Deddy added emoji laugh out loud.
In the video, Cindercella was very smart in presenting Deddy Corbuzier's makeup and style while she was still active as a magician. His appearance was very similar to Deddy whose hairdo was still in the style of the Ming Emperor.
Deddy's upload and response made netizens compare it to Melly Goeslaw, who felt that Bubah Alfian's makeup artist's attempt to imitate him in the Halloween Party had embarrassed him. "A good attitude is shown," said Kristo Imanuel, a copycat of the voices of dozens of characters praising Deddy.
Beloved Sabrina Chairunnisa herself tries to answer wisely the responses of netizens when comparing herself to Melly. "But uncle, the artist next door was turned into a joke material on Halloween instead, how about this," said @shendi_ant. Deddy answered, "Their respective rights. If I'm not SARA it's fun. "
Cindercella herself wrote her comments in the upload column of the father of one child. "Uncle Deddy is dancing! Thank you for inspiring makeup in the past. "Deddy praised Youtuber for making the makeup tutorial content. "This is amazing, how do you do it."
